\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class\DUrole{w}{ }}}\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{application.services.TimeEvalWrapper.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{TimeEvalWrapper}}}{\sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{data\_path}\DUrole{p}{:}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{n}{str}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{results\_path}\DUrole{p}{:}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{n}{str}}}{}
